com.oceanoptics.omnidriver.features.singlestrobe

Interface SingleStrobe


  • public interface SingleStrobe
    Interface for the devices that have advanced integration clock control. The intended devices are the HR4000, QE65000, USB2000+, HR4000+, USB4000.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getSingleStrobeHigh

        int getSingleStrobeHigh()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the Single Strobe High Clock Transition.
        Returns:
        the single strobe high clock transition.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if errors occur communicating with the spectrometer.

      • setSingleStrobeHigh

        void setSingleStrobeHigh(int counts)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Tell the spectrometer how long to wait after the start of the integration period before turning the lamp on.
        Parameters:
        counts - is the number of counts to delay after the start of the integration period before we turn the lamp on. Default value = 1, Minimum = 0, and Maximum = 0xFFFF (65535).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if errors occur communicating with the spectrometer.

      • getSingleStrobeLow

        int getSingleStrobeLow()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the Single Strobe Low Clock Transition.
        Returns:
        the single strobe low clock transition.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if errors occur communicating with the spectrometer.

      • setSingleStrobeLow

        void setSingleStrobeLow(int counts)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Tell the spectrometer how long to keep the lamp turned on.
        Parameters:
        counts - is the duration in counts to keep the lamp turned on. Default value = 1, Minimum = 0, and Maximum = 0xFFFF (65535).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if errors occur communicating with the spectrometer.

      • getSingleStrobeMinimum

        int getSingleStrobeMinimum()
        Getter for the final property SINGLE_STROBE_MIN.
        Returns:
        the strobe minimum clock transition value.

      • getSingleStrobeMaximum

        int getSingleStrobeMaximum()
        Getter for the final property SINGLE_STROBE_MAX.
        Returns:
        the strobe Maximum clock transition value.

      • getSingleStrobeIncrement

        int getSingleStrobeIncrement()
        Getter for the final property SINGLE_STROBE_STEP.
        Returns:
        the strobe clock step value.

      • getSingleStrobeCountsToMicros

        double getSingleStrobeCountsToMicros(int counts)
        Getter for the property countsToMicros.
        Parameters:
        counts - Value to convert to micros.
        Returns:
        the converted micro value
